project.name: DiamondQ: Master Parent
project.description: A common root-level POM for parents. Reusable by any

properties.osgi.base.removesrcheaders: Tool, Originally-Created-By, Bnd-LastModified, Private-Package, Include-Resource, Import-Package, Export-Package, Require-Capability, Provide-Capability

requireProperty.regexMessage: You must set the osgi.base.package property
